title: Godsword shards 2 & 3

properties.name: description
properties.value: These particular Godsword shards are created by smithing together Godsword shard 2 and Godsword shard 3. It can be combined with a Godsword shard 1 to complete the full Godsword blade. Combining shards to form the blade requires level 80 Smithing.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Godsword shards (2 and 3)
Godsword shards 2 & 3

Advanced data
Item ID11800

These particular Godsword shards are created by smithing together Godsword shard 2 and Godsword shard 3. It can be combined with a Godsword shard 1 to complete the full Godsword blade. Combining shards to form the blade requires level 80 Smithing.

10 December 2014

The item was renamed from "Godsword shards" to "Godsword shards 2 & 3".

[[File:Godsword shards 2 & 3 detail.png|left|100px]]
These particular '''Godsword shards''' are created by smithing together [[Godsword shard 2]] and [[Godsword shard 3]]. It can be combined with a [[Godsword shard 1]] to complete the full [[Godsword blade]]. Combining shards to form the blade requires level 80 [[Smithing]].
